backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence mapping listing project features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, and script mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and shared layout with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component with branding, navigation links, service list, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with logo, navigation, mobile menu, and call‑to‑action phone and quote buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with custom CSS variables for a green-themed light/dark palette and typography styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query and wraps the app with the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company story, values, and imagery for Nexeme pest control services.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information including phone, email, hours, and a hero section for reaching Nexeme.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring hero content, service highlights, features, and calls to action for Nexeme pest control.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists detailed descriptions and features of all offered pest control services with a hero section and service cards.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for building the Nexeme Pest Control website, listing features, requirements, contact info, and image assets needed.
